alert.note: Alert for Attala; Carroll; Holmes; Humphreys; Issaquena; Leflore; Sharkey; Washington; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 10:50PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Holmes, southwestern Carroll, southern Leflore, central Attala, southern Washington, northern Yazoo, northeastern Issaquena, Humphreys and Sharkey Counties through 1145 PM CST... At 1050 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Seven Pines to near Gassoway. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lexington and Emory around 1110 PM CST. Grace around 1115 PM CST. Bowling Green around 1120 PM CST. Durant and Rolling Fork around 1130 PM CST. Possumneck around 1135 PM CST. Onward around 1140 PM CST. Mcadams and Holly Bluff around 1145 PM CST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Mayersville, Silver City, Ethel, Sallis, West, Eden, Cary, Louise and Cruger. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for southeastern Arkansas...northeastern Louisiana...and central, north central, northwestern and west central Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Attala; Carroll; Holmes; Humphreys; Issaquena; Leflore; Sharkey; Washington; Yazoo
